item.title: VN30 constituents: Second Half-Year 2017
item.description: The HSX announces the following constituent changes to the VN30. The changes will be applied from 24/07/2017 to 19/01/2018. Constituent changes can be accessed here Exclusions: HAG, HNG, ITA Inclusions: NVL, ROS, SAB For the details of how to construct the VN30, please click here The exchange rate using is 1USD = 23,000VND

item.title: The Vietnam Daily Highlights 17/02/2017
item.description: The market saw some nice gains today to go along with a few losses for selected bluechips. Market breadth was quite narrow and we saw 28 stocks hit the ceiling while 20 stocks fell to the floor. Foreigners were somewhat less active today with much more selling than buying.

item.title: The Vietnam Weekly Forecast 20/2 - 24/2
item.description: The market saw some nice gains today to go along with a few losses for selected bluechips. Market breadth was quite narrow and we saw 28 stocks hit the ceiling while 20 stocks fell to the floor. Foreigners were somewhat less active today with much more selling than buying.

item.title: VNINDEX: Khả năng năng đi ngang còn kéo dài
item.description: Quan sát montly chart của VNINDEX, có thể thấy rằng VNINDEX đã hoàn toàn bứt phá được vùng đỉnh 630 - 650 được thiết lập kể từ 2009; và thậm chí đã vượt mốc 700. Tuy vậy cũng lưu ý rằng mức điểm này không có quá nhiều ý nghĩa về mặt kỹ thuật mà chỉ có đôi chút ý nghĩa về mặt tâm lý con số đơn thuần.

item.title: The VN30-Index constituents
item.description:
1. General
    • Name of Index: VN30
    • Type of Index: Price
    • Calculation Method: Based on free-float market capitalisation.
    • Number of Constituents: 30
    • Feaatures: Contains companies listed on the Ho Chi Minh Exchange with highest market capital and highest liquidity. They normally cover 80% of total market capitalisation and 60% of total market’s transaction value.
    • Criteria: market capitalisation, free-float, transaction value.
    • Other Criteria:
      • Not been assigned to be Designated Security, Controlled Security and Under Special Monitoring Segments in 3 months prior to the review.
      • Be continuosly listed in at least 6 months. If it’s market capitalisation is in top 5, the duration would be 3 months.
    • Capped: 10%
    • Review: Halfly (Jan, July). Effected day: the fourth Monday of the month.
